json.company_description: National University Libraries provides access to various academic resources including e-journals, e-books, theses, dissertations, and faculty publications.

warning: This scrape job was throttled at your current concurrency limit. If you'd like to scrape faster, you can upgrade your plan.
summary: The content provides an overview of the National University's eLibrary resources, including links to various databases for e-journals, e-books, open access theses, and faculty publications. It highlights the work of Dr. Ali Saud Ali Al Bimani and offers access to his online profiles on platforms like Google Scholar and ResearchGate. The library catalog allows users to search by title, author, subject, and more, with options for advanced search and browsing by hierarchy. The page also includes contact information for different colleges within the university.
